content:
fyi the download link on the "Using the FHIR Validator" page actually points to the publisher jar
page: https://wiki.hl7.org/Using_the_FHIR_Validator#Downloading_the_validator
download link: https://storage.googleapis.com/ig-build/org.hl7.fhir.publisher.jar

i was able to download the latest validator by changing "publisher" to "validator" in the download URL

The top of the wiki page states:

This wiki has undergone a migration to Confluence found Here

The current publisher is released on Github at https://github.com/HL7/fhir-ig-publisher/releases
The current validator is released on Github at https://github.com/hapifhir/org.hl7.fhir.core/releases

@jason chow
